【線上競馳】JAGUAR VISION GRAN TURISMO COUPÉ 純電概念超跑全球首演
04 Nov 2019, 11:30 by 鞠豪傑 Jet Chu
搖桿車手們注意了！Jaguar攜手全球知名賽車電玩 PlayStation《Gran Turismo Sport》，於東京Gran Turismo World Tour電競賽事中發表首款虛擬純電概念超跑 ─ Jaguar Vision Gran Turismo Coupé；此極具未來感的純電超跑，將從11月底開始成為遊戲陣容最新車款。


Jaguar攜手全球知名賽車電玩 PlayStation《Gran Turismo Sport》，於東京發表首款虛擬純電概念賽車 ─ Jaguar Vision Gran Turismo Coupé。

Jaguar Vision Gran Turismo Coupé純電概念超跑的設計與製作延續Jaguar輝煌賽車血統。充滿野心的設計源自於英國賽車傳奇C-TYPE及D-TYPE，FIA Formula E電動方程式 I-TYPE 4及 I-PACE eTROPHY賽車，則為其無與倫比的競速性能奠定科技基礎。Jaguar 設計團隊在數位世界中自由發揮創意，發展屬於未來 Jaguar 的設計美感與完美比例。


Jaguar Vision Gran Turismo Coupé設計靈感源自FIA Formula E電動方程式 I-TYPE 4及eTROPHY賽車。


外觀設計

Jaguar Advanced Design先進設計中心外型設計師Oliver Cattell-Ford表示：「這是車輛設計師的夢想計畫。為《Gran Turismo》創造未來跑車，代表我們的設計與想法能夠突破現實的限制。這款作品將激勵未來的世代，同時必須在視覺與感受方面，實現無可錯認的Jaguar跑車風格。」
Jaguar Vision GT Coupé 造形與設計受到 C-TYPE、D-TYPE與E-TYPE 三款 Jaguar 傳奇跑車的絕美輪廓與大膽比例薰陶。前衛的葉子板設計形似 C-TYPE，修長車頭承襲自D-TYPE，極具速度感的絕美座艙則受到E-TYPE 影響。


Jaguar Advanced Design 先進設計中心外型設計師 Oliver Cattell-Ford。

此款虛擬純電超跑採用實驗性輕量化材質製成，質地輕盈卻堅硬的單體式構造，使用碳纖維及先進鋁合金材質。此輕量化結構也使得 Jaguar Vision GT Coupé 總重僅 1,400 公斤，且具備 50:50 的絕佳配重。
Vision GT Coupé 是首款在前水箱護罩加上標識性躍豹的Jaguar車款。其他向傳奇歷史致敬的設計元素包含後輪拱兩側的充電孔，設計理念源自革命性的1968年XJ車款。


Jaguar Vision Gran Turismo Coupé座艙內的創新配備包含全息技術。車款具備名為「KITT-E」的AI人工智慧系統，能夠操控人車系統與介面，藉此強化與車款的情感連結。


座艙設計

Jaguar Advanced Design先進設計中心內裝設計師Chris Shaw表示：「我們竭盡所能想像 Jaguar 跑車座艙的未來樣貌。座艙結構視覺上充滿輕量化與極簡感受，卻非常激勵人心，並採用先進的實驗性材質及工法。身處於精心設計的座艙並望向 Jaguar Vision GT Coupé 優雅的修長車頭，玩家肯定能完全沈浸於美妙的駕馭體驗。」
座艙內的創新配備導入全息科技，搭載名為「KITT-E」的AI人工智慧系統，能夠操控人車系統與介面，藉此強化與車款的情感連結。此技術也能夠以不同形式顯示其他實用資訊，包含 3D 地圖與車輛狀態。


Jaguar Advanced Design 先進設計中心內裝設計師 Chris Shaw。

座艙設計旨在包圍駕駛者，創造如同 Jaguar 利曼冠軍車款 D-TYPE 的賽車體驗，兩側具備擴增實境數位玻璃，以強化車款兩側視野，玻璃並能顯示危險與障礙，藉此提升駕駛感知。此外，駕駛前方具有透明資訊儀錶，以Smiths儀錶顯示3D資訊，環形螢幕兩側整合車後影像，所有資訊皆位於駕駛視線中。
Jaguar為此車款創造獨特音效，令駕駛完全沈浸於賽車體驗。Vision GT Coupé 的獨特音效由Jaguar I-PACE音效團隊負責，利用1957年登上利曼頒獎台的「603」D-TYPE音效全新打造而成，結合當年賽車規格的 3.8L XK 引擎獨特聲浪與充滿未來感的純電音效。


Jaguar Vision Gran Turismo Coupé搭載三具結構精密、性能強悍的純電驅動馬達，總輸出高達1,020PS，賦予玩家低於 2 秒的 0-100km/h 加速體驗。


性能表現

Jaguar Vision GT Coupé不容妥協的競速性能由負責I-TYPE 4及I-PACE eTROPHY賽車的 Panasonic Jaguar Racing 設計團隊主導。此車款具備三具強悍而精密的純電馬達模組，分別為前、後輪提供強悍動力，總輸出達1,020PS (750 kW)及1,200Nm。玩家可於 2 秒內完成 0-100 km/h 加速，並且實現超越300km/h的極速表現。
Panasonic Jaguar Racing車隊總監James Barclay表示：「對於Jaguar Racing工程師而言，將Formula E的賽道經驗應用至Jaguar未來賽車極具挑戰性。我們透過Jaguar I-TYPE 4及eTROPHY的純電設計，精準調校出Jaguar Vision GT Coupé在數位世界的性能表現，創造無與倫比的駕馭樂趣，同時帶給對手強大威脅。」


● Jaguar Vision Gran Turismo Coupé將於11月底提供PlayStation 4《Gran Turismo Sport》玩家下載。

Jaguar Vision GT Coupé預計將於 11 月底現身《Gran Turismo Sport》賽道起跑線！

[Online competition] JAGUAR VISION GRAN TURISMO COUPÉ pure electric concept super run world premiere
04 Nov 2019, 11:30 by 鞠豪杰 Jet Chu
Rocker drivers pay attention! Jaguar teamed up with the world-renowned racing video game PlayStation Gran Turismo Sport to present the first virtual pure electric concept supercar in the Tokyo Gran Turismo World Tour competition - the Jaguar Vision Gran Turismo Coupé; this futuristic pure electric supercar, It will be the latest car lineup from the end of November.


Jaguar teamed up with the world-renowned racing video game PlayStation Gran Turismo Sport to present the first virtual pure electric concept car in Tokyo, the Jaguar Vision Gran Turismo Coupé.

The design and production of the Jaguar Vision Gran Turismo Coupé pure electric concept supercar continues Jaguar's brilliant racing heritage. The ambitious design is derived from the British racing legends C-TYPE and D-TYPE, the FIA Formula E electric formula I-TYPE 4 and the I-PACE eTROPHY racing car, which lay the foundation for its unparalleled racing performance. The Jaguar design team is free to be creative in the digital world, developing the aesthetics and perfect proportions of the future Jaguar.


The Jaguar Vision Gran Turismo Coupé is inspired by the FIA Formula E electric formula I-TYPE 4 and eTROPHY racing.


Design

Oliver Cattell-Ford, an exterior design designer at Jaguar Advanced Design, said: "This is a dream designer for vehicle designers. Creating a future sports car for Gran Turismo means that our designs and ideas can break through the limits of reality. The work will inspire future generations, and at the same time, the Jaguar sports car style must be realized in terms of vision and feeling."
The Jaguar Vision GT Coupé is shaped and designed with the C-TYPE, D-TYPE and E-TYPE three Jaguar legendary sports cars with a stunning silhouette and bold proportions. The avant-garde fender design resembles the C-TYPE, and the slender front is inherited from the D-TYPE. The stunning cockpit is extremely influenced by the E-TYPE.


Oliver Cattell-Ford, Jaguar Advanced Design's exterior design center.

This virtual pure electric super-run is made of experimental lightweight material. The lightweight but hard single structure is made of carbon fiber and advanced aluminum alloy. This lightweight construction also makes the Jaguar Vision GT Coupé weighs only 1,400 kg and has an excellent weight of 50:50.
The Vision GT Coupé is the first Jaguar model in the front tank cover with the signature leopard. Other design elements that pay tribute to legendary history include charging holes on either side of the rear wheel arch, designed from the revolutionary 1968 XJ model.


Innovative equipment in the Jaguar Vision Gran Turismo Coupé cockpit includes holographic technology. The car has an AI artificial intelligence system called "KITT-E", which can control the car system and interface to enhance the emotional connection with the car.


Cockpit design

Chris Shaw, designer of Jaguar Advanced Design's Advanced Design Center, said: "We do everything we can to imagine the future of the Jaguar sports car cockpit. The cockpit structure is visually full of lightweight and minimalist feel, but it is very inspiring and uses advanced experiments. The material and method of construction. In the well-designed cockpit and looking towards the elegant slender front of the Jaguar Vision GT Coupé, the player is sure to be completely immersed in the wonderful driving experience."
Innovative equipment in the cockpit is imported into holographic technology, and the AI artificial intelligence system called "KITT-E" can control the car system and interface to enhance the emotional connection with the car. This technology can also display other useful information in different forms, including 3D maps and vehicle status.


Chris Shaw, designer of Jaguar Advanced Design Advanced Design Center.

The cockpit is designed to surround the driver and create a racing experience like the Jaguar Lehman Champion D-TYPE, with augmented reality digital glass on both sides to enhance the view on both sides of the car, the glass and the dangers and obstacles. This improves driving perception. In addition, there is a transparent information instrument in front of the driving, 3D information is displayed by the Smiths meter, and the rear image is integrated on both sides of the ring screen. All the information is located in the driving line of sight.
Jaguar creates a unique sound for this car, making driving completely immersive in the racing experience. The unique sound of the Vision GT Coupé is handled by the Jaguar I-PACE sound team. It was created in 1957 with the "603" D-TYPE sound on the Liman Podium, combined with the unique 3.8L XK engine of the year's racing specifications. The futuristic pure sound effect.


The Jaguar Vision Gran Turismo Coupé is equipped with three purely electric motors with precise structure and powerful performance. The total output is up to 1,020PS, giving the player a 0-100km/h acceleration experience of less than 2 seconds.


Performance

The uncompromising racing performance of the Jaguar Vision GT Coupé is dominated by the Panasonic Jaguar Racing design team responsible for I-TYPE 4 and I-PACE eTROPHY racing. This model features three powerful and sophisticated pure electric motor modules that provide powerful power for the front and rear wheels, with a total output of 1,020 PS (750 kW) and 1,200 Nm. Players can complete 0-100 km/h acceleration in 2 seconds and achieve extreme speeds beyond 300km/h.
Panasonic Jaguar Racing team director James Barclay said: "For Jaguar Racing engineers, applying Formula E's track experience to Jaguar's future car is challenging. We use the pure electric design of Jaguar I-TYPE 4 and eTROPHY to precisely adjust The Jaguar Vision GT Coupé delivers the performance of the digital world, creating unparalleled driving pleasure while posing a strong threat to your opponent."


● The Jaguar Vision Gran Turismo Coupé will be available for PlayStation 4 "Gran Turismo Sport" players at the end of November.

The Jaguar Vision GT Coupé is expected to appear at the start of the Gran Turismo Sport track at the end of November!
